channel.title: Reporting
channel.description:
Hey i dont kno were reporting is... But someone trying to get people from MY server onto his...
Here is server (revivalscape.no-ip.info) someone do somethink that not really nice takeing people form your server to there's...
So someone do somethink about this.. please..
Thanks!
PS: Oh and my ::ban & ::ipban aint working, all it does it d/c and that it... Someone help me with it incase of spammers.. or somethink alse?
Thanks again!

item.title: Reporting
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

To report someone, there should be a link at the bottom of a post called, “Report to Moderator,” do that.

Read full topic
